topic: Trump's controversial Tylenol-autism claim sparks global scientific and political backlash.
evaluation: This cluster details the controversy surrounding former President Trump's unfounded claims linking acetaminophen (Tylenol/paracetamol) to autism. The articles cover the initial pre-announcement report, the official announcement itself, immediate scientific and medical expert rebuttals from within the US, international health organization and political condemnations, and subsequent analysis of the scientific evidence presented by the White House. The timeline is logical and progressive, illustrating the unfolding story comprehensively. No articles were deemed noise as all contribute significantly and relevantly to the overall narrative's development.
